text.name: info7
text.text: The Virtual Boy is a 32-bit table-top video game console. It was marketed

text.name: info8
text.text: as the first console capable of displaying stereoscopic 3D graphics. The

text.name: info9
text.text: player uses the console in a manner similar to a head-mounted display,

text.name: info10
text.text: placing their head against the unit to see a red monochrome display.

text.name: info11
text.text: The games use a parallax effect to create the illusion of depth.
